https://tmrev.io/movie/127069-Avantasia - The Flying Opera: Around the World in Twenty Days 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8OkpxcenkdkSHiOAyTudWdXqN0I.jpg The Flying Opera is the first Avantasia live album by German power metal vocalist Tobias Sammet, released in March 2011. It was recorded during their first world tour in 2008, in support of the album The Scarecrow. Avantasia - The Flying Opera: Around the World in Twenty Days
